Name: Jose
description:
Jose has been a farmer for more than 40 years. He lives on a small farm in the region of Campinas, where he works and sustains his household. He is married and has a son who also helps him with the harvesting and planting.

He supplies manioc, peppers, zucchinis, jil√≥ [scarlet eggplant], and other vegetables to small supermarkets in the region. His produce is organic, and he does not use any chemical product that could harm the crop.

This loan will help him to purchase protective screens and a greenhouse, and to rent a machine for preparing the land. Jose is very dedicated; and through his work and knowledge in the area of agriculture, he helps other people with his experience.
